text:
I had a pretty good session with Region VI people at L.A.
and everyone seemed to feel we were going in the right direction
in the plans we are developing ;for reshaping the organization
along the lines of semi-autonomous interest groups. Also had a
good long talk with Jim Day.
I am glad that the doctors have finally got at the seat of
your troubles and rectified the situation.
Cordially,
William 0. Harley
